sow.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to plant or scatter seeds on a piece of ground
sow.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Sow the seeds in late March.
These fields used to be sown with oats.
sow.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to do something that will cause a bad situation in the future
sow.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: repressive laws that are sowing the seeds of future conflicts
an attempt to sow doubt among the jury members
